attributes.action: stop E.U. Control of our Armed Forces
attributes.additional_details: pass this among your friends the e.u is trying to back door control of a very valuable part of our countries defence
attributes.background:
stop the E.U Taking control off our amend forces through the U.E.G.S.
Lets keep our armed forces controlled by our own gov,t .
we sign allegiance to our Queen and sovereign not some E.U beurocrat

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
